div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Aug. 10, 1912. THE NORWEGIAN NATIONAL COMMITTEE

body.p: The following report was submitted by the employment office of the Norwegian National Committee:
In May, 210 applications were received--135 from men, 75 from women. Only 120 of these were placed in jobs.
In June, 236 applications were received from the city, and 63 from out of town.
The month of May showed a deficit, as did the month of June. The fixed monthly expenses amount to about $130.
